SELECT d.dept_id AS source_ID, d.`name` AS source_name, SUM(o.amount_count) AS product_count, SUM(o.amount_price) AS product_amount FROM sys_dept d LEFT JOIN tb_orders o ON o.source_id = d.dept_id AND o.order_type = 2 AND o.status = 2 WHERE 1=1
AND d.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query.sourceName}, '%')
GROUP BY d.dept_id

SELECT o.order_no, o.order_type, o.date, g.g_code, g.g_name, g.specification, g.py_code, u.gu_name AS unitName, og.price, og.good_num AS count, og.total_price, w.wh_name, d.name AS source_name FROM tb_orders o LEFT JOIN tb_order_goods og ON og.order_id = o.id LEFT JOIN tb_goods_info g ON g.id = og.good_id LEFT JOIN tb_goods_unit u ON u.id = g.unit LEFT JOIN tb_warehouse w ON w.wh_id = o.wh_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON d.dept_id = o.source_id WHERE o.order_type = 2 AND o.status = 2 AND d.dept_id = #{sourceId} ORDER BY o.order_date DESC
